{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Inseego |model=R1000 |fcc_date=08/28/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, 5G router, LTE router, analog phone gateway |fcc_id=PKRNVWR1000 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |flags=5G LTE, GPS, analog phone port, battery backup, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Verizon-R1000-wxyz }} {{TagLine|5G Home Router}}
This device will likely be sold through ''Verizon'' and branded accordingly.
*[https://www.4gltemall.com/inseego-r1000-5g-home-router.html ''Inseego R1000 5G Home Router'' on '''4G|LTEmall''']
